column2: "Ao EWURADZE
column3: ɔwoara enye hɔn a wɔnye me dzi esi no nsi: Ɔwoara enye hɔn a wɔnye me ko no nko."

column2: "Suo kyɛm na nkataenyim mu
"Twe peaa no so
column3: na siw hɔn a wɔtaa mo do no kwan: Se me kra dɛ

column2: "Ma hɔn a wɔrohwehwɛ mu wu no hɔn enyim ngu ase
column3: na fɛr nka hɔn: Ma hɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔn no nsan hɔn ekyir na hɔn enyim ngu ase."

column2: "Ma wɔnyɛ dɛ ntsɛw wɔ mframa enyim
column3: Na ma EWURADZE no bɔfoe no mbɔ hɔn ngu."

column2: "Ma hɔn kwan mu nyɛ sum na ɔnyɛ tortor
column3: Na ma EWURADZE no bɔfoe no ntsiw hɔn."

column2: "Na gyan ara na woesua me efir ehuntsa wɔ mona mu; Gyan ara na woetu mona ama me kra."
"Ma ɔsɛɛ ndwir hɔn do awora; Na ma n’efir a oesua ehuntsa no mpa hɔnara: Ma wɔnhwe ɔsɛɛ kor noara mu."
"Nna me kra bedzi ehurusi wɔ EWURADZE mu: N’enyi bɛgye no nkwagye no mu."
"Me mbiew nyinara bɛse dɛ
column4: woana na ɔnye wo sɛ? Ɔwo a egye ɔbɔbɔfo fi nyia ɔyɛ dzen dodow ma no no nsamu
column6: ɔbɔbɔnyi na hianyi no fi nyia ɔfa no afo no nsamu?"

column2: "Adasefo nkontompɔfo soɛr gyina; Wobisa me ndzɛmba a minnyim ho hwee."
"Wɔdze bɔn tua me papa kaw
column3: Na wɔma me kra yɛ egyanka."

column2: "Naaso emi dze
column4: mufuraa eyitam: Medze mbuadadzi haaw me kra; Na medze yaw bɔɔ mpaa dzendzenndzen."

column2: "Meyɛɛ m’adze dɛ gyama ɔyɛ me nyɛnko bi anaa mo nua bi: Mobɔɔ mo mu adze dzii awerɛhow dɛ obi a origyam ne na."
"Naaso emi dze mokɔr ahokyer mu no
column4: na wɔkaa hɔnho boaa ano: Akwasampafo no kaa hɔn ho boaa ano tsiaa me a nna minnyim; Tsetsew ara na wɔtsetseew me

column2: "Wɔtse dɛ aponto ho daadaa atwetwesifo
column3: Wɔtwɛɛr hɔn se guu mo do."

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: ebɔhwɛ ara ma ekodu dabɛn? Gye me kra fi hɔn nsɛɛe no mu
column4: Gye me nkwa fi dɛm ngyata yi nsamu"

column2: "Mebɛda wo ase wɔ mboanofo kɛse no mu: Mibeyi wo ayɛw wɔ aman dodow mu."
"Mma mma hɔn a wɔyɛ m’atamfo atorfo no nnsi me atwetwe; Nkyii so mma mma hɔn a wokyir me kwa no mmbubu me enyikyiw."
"Osiandɛ wɔnnka asomdwee nsɛm: Na mbom wɔdwen ndaadaasɛm tsia hɔn a wɔdwe wɔ asaase do no."
"Nyew
column3: wɔhanhan hɔn anomu petoo wɔ mo do; Wɔse dɛ

column2: "EWURADZE
column5: mma mmfi me nkyɛn nnkɔ ekyir."

column2: "Kenyan woho
"EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn
column3: bua me atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ wo tsenenee tse
column4: Na mma mma wonnsi me atwetwe."

column2: "Mma mma wɔnnse wɔ hɔn akoma mu dɛ
column4: dza yɛpɛ nye yi: Mma mma wɔnnse dɛ

column2: "Ma hɔn a hɔn enyi gye mo mbusu ho nyina hɔn enyi nto na hɔn enyim ngu ase: Ma enyito na fɛr mfura hɔn a wodzi mo do ekokrokosɛm no."
"Ma hɔn a hɔn enyi sɔ me tsenenee mbɔ ose
column6: Ɔno a n’enyi sɔ n’akowaa no prɔmprɔmyɛ."

column2: "Na me tɛkyerɛma bɛkasa wɔ wo tsenenee
column3: Na w’ayɛyi ho adzekyee tsentsen nyinara."
